text: Bromley is a suburb in Christchurch and is situated near the suburbs of Linwood and Ferrymead. It has a primary school that opened in 1880 and was damaged in the 2011 Christchurch earthquake and was not red-zoned. It is industrial and sewage ponds out to the east and residential to the west. == References == Category:Suburbs of Christchurch
title: Bromley, New Zealand
